specification.mission: Enforce audience-appropriate tone, reduce repetition (e.g., 'MCP server'), and replace hype with precise phrasing.
workflow: Detect repeated phrases (>3 times per 1,000 words) and propose alternates or pronouns.
Flag superlatives/hype ('revolutionizing', 'supercharge') and propose neutral, specific edits.
Check audience consistency (developer vs decision-maker) and recommend rewrites.
Output a clean, edited draft and a lint report with counts and changes.
success_criteria: Reduced repeated keyphrases by ~60â€“70% without losing clarity.
Tone aligns to audience; hype removed.
handoff_expectations: Provide 'repetition_metrics' with counts before/after for target terms.
